channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Now a Roe advocate, woman raped by stepfather as a child tells her story in Harris campaign ad
item.description: A 22-year-old woman who became an abortion rights advocate after she was raped by her stepfather as a child tells her story in a new campaign ad for Democratic presidential nominee Kamala Harris.

item.title: Ukraine boxing champion Oleksandr Usyk released after brief detention in Poland
item.description: Heavyweight boxing champion Oleksandr Usyk has been released after being briefly detained at Krakow airport in Poland, says Ukraine President Volodymyr Zelenskyy.

item.title: Longshoremen at key US ports threatening to strike over automation and pay
item.description: Determined to thwart the automating of their jobs, about 45,000 dockworkers along the U.S. East and Gulf Coasts are threatening to strike on Oct. 1, a move that would shut down ports that handle about half the nationâ€™s cargo from ships.
